channel.title: We've Got Worm + Worm: An Unabridged Production
channel.description: This feed collates the Worm audiobook project "Worm: An Unabridged Production" with the relevant episodes of the analysis podcast "We've Got Worm

item.title: Gestation 1.1
item.author: productionsabaddon@gmail.com
item.description:
This is a production of Worm, by John "Wildbow" McCrae. The original text can be found at http://parahumans.wordpress.com.
Thanks to pallysuune for narrating.
Worm and the Parahumans stories are the intellectual property of J.C. McCrae. No copyright infringement is intended.
This recording was made possible with the permission of J.C. McCrae.
